history.proof: intros d Hd. apply u_conv_0_ref_ok. apply Hd.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> preDTA_ref_ok (udta_conv_0 d)

Premises:
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
preDTA = Map state : Set
udta_conv_0 = fun d : preDTA => M2 state (udta_conv_0_aux d) (M0 state) : preDTA -> preDTA
u_conv_0_ref_ok : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> preDTA_ref_ok (udta_conv_0 d)
u_conv_1_ref_ok : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> preDTA_ref_ok (udta_conv_1 d)
u_merge_ref_ok : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d1 -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1)
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
predta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d -> predta_ref_ok_check d = true
predta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check d = true -> preDTA_ref_ok d
udta_conv_0_compat : forall d : preDTA, dta_correct d -> dta_correct (udta_conv_0 d)
udta_conv_0_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (udta_conv_0 d) sigma
u_conv0_2 : forall d : preDTA, u_conv_lr_0 d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
new_state_insd_2 : forall d : preDTA, new_state_insd_def_lst d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
udta_conv_0_1_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, dta_compat d0 d1 -> dta_compat (udta_conv_0 d0) (udta_conv_1 d1)
insert_ostate_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (a0 : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a = None -> a <> a0 -> reconnaissance d a0 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate d a (Some s)) a0 t
u_conv_0_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some (umpl_conv_0 ladj)
u_conv_0_invar_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some (umpl_conv_0 ladj) -> MapGet state d a = Some ladj
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
new_state_ins_r : forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t0 : term) (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), reconnaissance d0 a0 t0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> d0 = MapPut state d a s -> MapGet state d a = None -> a <> a0 -> reconnaissance d a0 t0
u_conv_0_invar_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_0 ladj0 /\ MapGet state d a = Some ladj0
u_conv_0_invar_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_0 ladj0
predta_ref_ok_check_correct_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d' -> predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true
predta_ref_ok_check_complete_0 : forall d d' : preDTA, predta_ref_ok_check_0 d d' = true -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d d'
insert_ostate_9 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0' s1' : state) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> a = new_preDTA_ad (u_merge d0 d1) -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t \/ reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
udta_conv_0_correct_wrt_sign_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (udta_conv_0_aux d) sigma
pl_tl_length_rec_1 : forall d : preDTA, pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d prec_empty tnil
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
u_conv0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> reconnaissance (udta_conv_0 p) (uad_conv_0 a) t
u_conv0_r : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance (udta_conv_0 p) (uad_conv_0 a) t -> reconnaissance p a t
u_conv_1_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some (umpl_conv_1 ladj)
udta_conv_0_ref_ok_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> exists (s' : state) (p' : prec_list) (b' : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s' /\ MapGet prec_list s' c = Some p' /\ p = upl_conv_0 p' /\ s = umpl_conv_0 s' /\ b = uad_conv_0 b' /\ prec_occur p' b'
insert_main_state = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => insert_main_state_0 d (new_preDTA_ad d) s : preDTA -> state -> DTA
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
u_merge_0r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s
u_conv_0_invar_8 : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (s0 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> exists a1 : ad, a0 = uad_conv_0 a1
udta_conv_1 = fun d : preDTA => M2 state (M0 state) (udta_conv_1_aux d) : preDTA -> preDTA
u_conv_disj : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a1 = Some s1 -> a0 <> a1
u_conv_1_invar_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_1 ladj0 /\ MapGet state d a = Some ladj0
u_merge_0 : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s -> MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s
insert_ostate_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_1 a1 -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_1 a1) t
insert_ostate_1 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s s0 s1 s0' s1' : state) (t : term), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1) -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) a = None -> a <> uad_conv_0 a0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some s)) (uad_conv_0 a0) t
```intros d Hd. apply u_conv_0_ref_ok. apply Hd.```
